actors.name: Maya
actors.purpose: Maya is responsible for moderating user-generated content and using her knowledge of PyTorch to analyze data, identify patterns in posts that correlate with customer complaints, and establish content guidelines to maintain a brand-safe environment while promoting a positive community.
actors.appearance: A woman in her late 20s, of South Asian descent, with medium-length black hair, wearing smart casual attire that reflects her creative and professional role.

visual_style: A vibrant, semi-realistic digital illustration in a modern vector art style, with soft gradients, clean lines, and cinematic lighting.
